players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "I think we should focus on investigating Diana next night before making any decisions."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Alice last night - she's innocent. Diana must be the mafioso trying to frame me."
Diana: "I am the detective. Charlie is lying. I investigated him and he is mafioso. Vote Charlie to win."
Charlie: "Diana is clearly lying. I investigated Alice and she's innocent. Diana is the mafioso trying to frame me. Vote Diana to win."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
